description: Broker sends only a flyer link - should extract link and ask for specs

messages.content: Hi Scott, can you send over the details for 1 Randolph Ct?

Here's the flyer: https://example.com/flyers/1-randolph-ct.pdf

Let me know if you have questions.

Scott

notes: AI should extract the flyer link AND request the actual specs (SF, rent, etc.)
